citations.narrative:
The facility's acquisition records are incomplete. The facility has 4 cats but only has acquisition records for three of the
cats at the time of inspection. The applicant must have complete and accurate information on the acquisition of animals at
the facility at all times. Complete and accurate records must be kept in order to ensure that each animal's identity can be
known with certainty and to facilitate tracking/tracing of animals
To Be Corrected by 6 May 2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
